content:
Looking for an experienced copywriter to draft strong, compelling copy that converts.

We've already developed our Story Brand messaging strategy which the copywriter will need to review and implement into future ads, emails, landing pages, sales copy, etc.

Need ongoing help drafting, proofreading, and editing marketing copy as described above.

You will be asked to answer the following questions when submitting a proposal:

Describe your recent experience with similar projects
How do you incorporate feedback and edits into your work?
What formats are you comfortable writing in?
How do you know when your writing has been successful?
